item.title: About Me
item.description: Who’s this guy? Hi, i’m QianChen. I’m a weak system programmer enjoying in distributed storage system. For a quick overview, I’m currently: Learning distributed system which is much interesting and cool! Ricing Arch Linux+i3wm configuration. Enjoying to work on emacs. Playing with rasppberry pi to build lots of amazing things. I also love tennis, animes and card games. I have played Yo-Gi-Oh! for more than seven years.
